casebody.data:
MASTERPIECE CAKESHOP, LTD., et al., petitioners,
v.
COLORADO CIVIL RIGHTS COMMISSION, et al. No. 16-111. Supreme Court of the United States June 26, 2017.

Motion of Foundation For Moral Law for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Colorado granted.
